text: State of Emergency is a beat 'em up video game developed by VIS Entertainment and published by Rockstar Games for PlayStation 2 and Xbox. ==Plot== In 2023, the United States government was weakened by an economy crisis. In response, the American Trade Organization, most commonly known as "The Corporation" Category:2002 video games Category:Rockstar Games games Category:Beat 'em ups Category:Organized crime video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Shoot 'em ups Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: State of Emergency (video game)
